GET /api.description: Returns a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the NC News API

GET /api/topics.description: Returns an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Returns an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Returns the comments for an article by its article ID
